fromsage.combinat.matrices.hadamard_matriximporthadamard_matrix,skew_hadamard_matrix
foriinrange(1,12):
H=hadamard_matrix(4*i)
print(i,H.str())
SageMathCellTypesomeSagecodebelowandpressEvaluate.
1
fromsage.combinat.matrices.hadamard_matriximporthadamard_matrix,skew_hadamard_matrix
2
foriinrange(1,12):
3
H=hadamard_matrix(4*i)
4
print(4*i,'=================')
5
print(H.str())
